document_data.mainbody:
araths shield was an ancient, enchanted shield in the Kingdom of Mertwig, presumably once owned by someone named Garath.
This shield carried a +3 enchantment, providing its wielder much greater protection.
When King Mertwig was on the verge of death at age 65, various fortune hunters and individuals claiming to be his long-lost heirs scoured his kingdom in search of wealth and treasure. Garaths shield ended up being one of nine magical items that the would-be heirs of Mertwig would discover during their journey.
